pages.image_prompt: A bright, lush jungle scene with tall green trees, colorful birds flying, and a smiling monkey swinging from a vine. Sunlight filters through the thick canopy above. The title 'Jungle Adventure' is in bold, playful letters across the top. Colors are vibrant: emerald greens, sunny yellows, and splashes of red and blue. Mood is fun and exciting., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

A colorful banner made of tropical leaves in green, yellow, and red stretches across the top. A small open book icon floats in the center with a frog sitting on it. Background has soft palm fronds and butterflies. Text is large and clear. Mood is cheerful and inviting., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text:
Sound it out: big, red, run, vines, tall

Know these: the, is, very, they

New words: canopy, rainforest, jungle, toucan
pages.image_prompt: Three neat rows on a pastel green background. First row: phonetic words with tiny icons—'big' next to a large leaf, 'red' next to a red flower, 'run' next to a running frog, 'vines' with a curling vine, 'tall' next to a tree. Second row: sight words with stars above them. Third row: special words with small pictures—'canopy' under treetops, 'rainforest' with rain drops, 'jungle' with a monkey, 'toucan' with a bird with a big beak. Layout is clean and child-friendly., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

A steamy jungle floor with mist rising. Large green leaves glisten with water droplets. A small lizard sits on a log. Colors are deep green and brown with golden light. Mood is warm and humid., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

A wide view of the jungle stretching far into the distance. Tall trees rise up, covered in moss. Birds fly between them. Sky is pale blue above the treetops. Mood is vast and wild., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Looking up through giant tree trunks to the thick green canopy high above. Sunbeams shine down. A monkey peeks from the leaves. Colors are bright green and gold. Mood is magical and high up., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Thick, twisty vines dangle from high branches. A parrot perches on one. Leaves sway in the breeze. Greens and browns dominate. Mood is playful and natural., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Two bright green frogs leap over a log. They have big smiles. Ferns and flowers surround them. Background is dense green. Mood is energetic and fun., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Close-up of a large, vivid red flower blooming near the ground. A butterfly hovers above it. Frogs look on with wonder. Reds and greens pop. Mood is curious and bright., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: The toucan is in the trees.
pages.image_prompt: A friendly toucan with a big rainbow beak stands on a branch. It looks at the reader. Leaves rustle around it. Colors are bold: black, white, orange, red. Mood is cheerful and surprising., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Close-up of the toucan's beak showing red, orange, and yellow stripes. Its eye sparkles. Background is soft green blur. Mood is fun and colorful., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Toucan flapping its wings, soaring upward through the trees toward the top layer. Sunlight shines above. Other birds watch. Mood is free and joyful., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Panoramic jungle view—thousands of green leaves, vines, and tall trunks. A stream winds through. Light sparkles on water. Mood is peaceful and full of life., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Two monkeys gripping thick vines, climbing up. One sticks out its tongue playfully. Trees loom behind. Mood is silly and active., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Monkeys reaching the top of the trees, popping their heads above the canopy. Clouds float nearby. View shows the whole rainforest below. Mood is triumphant and grand., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Flat view of the treetop layer like a green roof. Birds glide over it. Sun shines brightly. Mood is calm and high-up., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Monkeys wave at the toucan, who perches on a high branch. All three smile. Leaves flutter. Colors are bright and warm. Mood is friendly and happy., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Wide aerial view of the endless jungle. Rivers snake through. Mountains are in the distance. Tiny animals move below. Mood is vast and wondrous., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Close-up of steam rising from wet leaves. A lizard pants with its mouth open. Droplets fall from above. Colors are dark green and shiny. Mood is steamy and warm., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Sudden rain pours down. Animals dash for cover—frogs hop, birds fly, monkeys grab vines. Raindrops splash everywhere. Mood is chaotic and fun., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Everything glistens with rain. Puddles form on the forest floor. A frog jumps into one. Leaves drip water. Mood is fresh and cool., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

All the animals—monkey, toucan, frogs—sit together under a big leaf, laughing. Rainbow appears in the distance. Mood is joyful and cozy., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

pages.text: Did you know? The canopy is like a green roof that holds most of the jungle animals!
pages.image_prompt: Illustration of the canopy layer teeming with life: birds, monkeys, frogs, insects—all living in the treetops. Sunlight streams through. Label points to 'canopy'. Style is educational but fun, with cartoon animals., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image

Solid bright green background with the Funbookies logo (a smiling sun wearing glasses and holding a book) centered at the bottom. Text below says 'Fun & Easy Books for New Readers!' in playful font. No other text., children's book illustration, bright colors, friendly, engaging, educational, no text in image
